sentences.en: -- Reinforcing vocational training among the farmers.
sentences.cn: -- 加强对农民的职业技术培训.

sentences.en: Article 8 Rudimentary training shall be carried out by vocational training institutions.
sentences.cn: 第八条(办理机构)养成训练,由职业训练机构办理.

sentences.en: As a vocational teacher I could pretty much pick and choose my work.
sentences.cn: 作为一名职业教师，我几乎可以随意挑拣自己的工作。

sentences.en: Establish Guang Dong province set an example secondary vocational schools now.
sentences.cn: 现在创建广东省示范性中等职业学校.

sentences.en: It created freedom of movement and of vocational choice.
sentences.cn: 它创立了迁徙自由和选择职业的自由.

sentences.en: Obviously the purely vocational training once favored is not enough.
sentences.cn: 曾经一度受人垂青的纯职业教育显然是不够的.

sentences.en: Productive practice is an important link and primary form in vocational education.
sentences.cn: 生产实践是高职实践教学的主要形式和重要环节.

sentences.en: She was given some quick training at the vocational school.
sentences.cn: 她在职业学校受过速成训练.

sentences.en: Students from vocational school fill the need of the factory for technicians.
sentences.cn: 职业学校毕业的学生填补了这家工厂对技术工人的需求.

sentences.en: The development of vocational education in rural modernization played a decisive role.
sentences.cn: 职业教育发展对农村现代化发展起着决定性作用.

sentences.en: Tracking assigns some students to college prep and others to vocational programs.
sentences.cn: 按照能力，一些学生被分到大学预科班，另一些则被分到职业培训班。
给予职业指导是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Vocational courses are often given more respect and funding than arts or philosophy.
sentences.cn: 职业技术类课程通常能够获得比艺术或哲学类课程更多的重视和资助。

sentences.en: Vocational teaching materials and various forms of reference material are provided free for the prisoners.
sentences.cn: 对罪犯无偿提供各种技术教育的教材和资料.

sentences.en: We'll provide you with vocational training.
sentences.cn: 我们将为你提供职业培训.

phrases.tran_cn: 职业康复；职业复健；职业更新；职业复原辅导
职业训练局；职业培训委员会

trans.tran_cn: 职业的，行业的，天职的，有助于职业的
trans.tran_en: teaching or relating to the skills you need to do a particular job
